p: The central question that this qualitative research sought to answer was on access to energy services in the face of climate change. To answer this question, a detailed understanding of womenâ€™s interaction with their immediate environment placing it within the specific context of rural women in Botswana was carried out. Data were generated through semi-structured interviews, participant observation and focus group discussions as well as insights from published and unpublished literature, and other available sources of information. Data were subjected to qualitative processing and analysis for emerging categories as presented in the main findings.
